Title: Would You Love Me If I Was Different?
Plot: Brad seeks a new life without Nicole so he secures a job and scores a date. James falls in love, but is that love too strong for James? Marty offends Maxine but he doesn?t know why. Rachel tries to return a piece of Marty?s love to its rightful place and Nicole saves a baby.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
